name: The Last War-Birds
description:
As the great beast Shataxx closes in on the city of Saint-Monique, the rich and powerful flee; the top eschelons of the military flee; the politically connected and even the lucky flee. The rest must fend for themselves. Three pilots - and those close to them - are recruited for one wild mission.

This  is a playable beta that shows the story, the characters and much of the music. A cleaned up version will follow....
